caption:
Have you tried our mushroom coffee?**

Although it’s not actually coffee, this alternative provides a boost of energy, improved focus, and less anxiety.

**What about the flavor?**

Many who have tried other blends agree that mushrooms don’t always have the best taste compared to other brands. However, our blend features a delightful chai tea flavor. In my opinion, the flavor is neither too strong nor muddy.

If you’ve tried other mushroom coffees and weren’t impressed, give ours a chance. We guarantee you’ll appreciate not just the flavor but also the positive effects on your body and mind.

By the way, THIS PRODUCT DOES NOT CONTAIN ANY CONTROLLED SUBSTANCES (no 🌱 or magic 🍄).
available at www.sistersofthevalley.org
